document.full_text: indian spiritual guru sri sathya sai baba, revered by millions of followers as a living god, died sunday in a hospital in southern india. he was 86.
document.title: indian spiritual guru sai baba dies
lines_and_colors: indian spiritual guru sri sathya sai baba, revered by millions of followers as a living god, died sunday in a hospital in southern india. he was 86.
